articles.author: icc
articles.title: Pat Cummins joins exclusive group with T20 World Cup hat-trick - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The Australia bowler claimed three wickets across two separate overs to achieve the milestone against Bangladesh.
articles.content:
Remarkably, speaking to the ICC after the match, Cummins revealed that he'd forgotten that he was even on a hat-trick when he started his final over:
"Its been a pretty good day all round; a few tro… [+283 chars]
